downloadTitle: Demand Management and Workflow in Project Server 2013
downloadDescription: Demand management is a key process for many customers in the Project lifecycle – from initiation, selection to planning and managing. Typically follows the customer business process or methodology requirements Consists of Phases, Stages, Project Detail Pa
detailsSection: Demand management is a key process for many customers in the Project lifecycle – from initiation, selection to planning and managing. Typically follows the customer business process or methodology requirements Consists of Phases, Stages, Project Detail Pa
systemRequirementsSection:

    • Microsoft Office PowerPoint
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to your desired file location.
  3. Find the file where you chose to save it and double-click it to open it.
